law.text:
In addition to the definitions in KRS 278.010 and KRS 278.516(2), for KRS 278.546 to 278.5462, the following definitions shall apply:
"Broadband" means any service that is used to deliver video or to provide access to the Internet and that consists of the offering of the capability to transmit information at a rate that is generally not less than two hundred (200) kilobits per second in at least one direction; or any service that combines computer processing, information storage, and protocol conversion to enable users to access Internet content and services. Nothing in this definition shall be construed to include any intrastate service, other than digital subscriber line service, tariffed at the commission as of July 15, 2004.
"Local exchange carrier" means any company certified by the commission to provide local exchange telecommunications service in the Commonwealth on or before June 30, 1995.
law.history: Created 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 167, sec. 2, effective July 13, 2004.
